data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
SynSim is a set of modules which allows the user to automate
    running a simulator with various parameters. It can work with any
    simulator (in fact on any program, not only simulators), but
    simulators that accept text input files and produce text output
    files are better supported. There is support for data analysis and
    plotting.

    I found no modules on CPAN that do something similar.

    Following some discussion on the modules list
    (http://www.xray.mpe.mpg.de/mailing-lists/modules/2002-11/msg00331.html
    ), I propose a new top level namespace Simulation, under which all
    kinds of simulation-related modules, like SynSim, could be put.
